value: 7999 - Amusement and Recreation Services, Not Elsewhere Classified Summary > BROTHERS LEAGUES CLUB (CAIRNS) LIMITED is an Australian public company. Its operations cover membership sports and recreation clubs. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. BROTHERS LEAGUES CLUB (CAIRNS) LIMITED is headquartered in Manunda, Queensland. It is headed by director and company secretary Robert Darryl Crane. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $38.12 million. Its net profit totalled $6.81 million. BROTHERS LEAGUES CLUB (CAIRNS) LIMITED forms part of the services industry sector. Key Personnel > No key personnel were found for the selected company.
